home.title: Drywall Partition System Structural Calculation System
home.description: A web-based tool to accurately verify the structural suitability of KIRII dry wall steel C-type studs and ceiling suspension systems
home.wallStudDescription: Perform structural calculations for C-type and CT-type steel studs
home.wallStudFeature1: Verification of bending strength, shear strength, web buckling, and deflection limit
home.wallStudFeature2: Verification of combined bending and compression action
home.wallStudFeature3: Consideration of wind loads, imposed loads, dead loads, and loads from wall fixtures
home.ceilingDescription: Perform structural calculations for runners and hanging hangers
home.ceilingFeature1: Verification of bending strength, shear strength, web buckling, and deflection limit
home.ceilingFeature2: Verification of hanger tensile force and anchor tensile resistance
home.ceilingFeature3: Consideration of wind loads and dead loads
home.feature1Description: Ensures design safety and regulatory compliance through rigorous calculations following engineering standards and formulas
home.feature2Description: Generate PDF format reports including input information, calculation process, and pass/fail judgments
home.feature3Description: Intuitive UI/UX allows for complete input of necessary information and clear confirmation of results

sampleGuide.title: Sample Calculation Guide
sampleGuide.description: This guide explains how to input data to get the same results as the sample calculation. Use it for verification during the testing phase.

overview.title: Sample Calculation Overview
overview.subtitle: Wall stud calculation example for Grantham Hospital
overview.targetDescription: Structural calculation of KIRII drywall steel C-type stud (C 75x45x0.8t)
overview.sampleDescription: This sample calculation is based on an actual structural calculation document created for the Grantham Hospital project dated May 16, 2025. It can be used as a test case to verify that the same calculation results are obtained with the same input conditions in this system.

inputGuide.title: Input Guide
inputGuide.description: How to input data to get the same results as the sample calculation
inputGuide.author: Author
inputGuide.enterWindLoad: Enter "0" (wind load is not considered in the sample calculation)
inputGuide.step5Title: Step 5: Enter Dead Load and Fixture Data
inputGuide.deadLoadNote: The sample calculation does not consider dead load and fixture load, so enter the following values:

resultsComparison.title: Results Comparison
resultsComparison.description: Comparison of calculation results between the sample calculation document and this system
resultsComparison.verificationDescription: As shown in the comparison table above, the calculation results of this system match exactly with the results of the sample calculation document. This confirms the accuracy of the calculation logic in this system.
resultsComparison.testStep1: Follow the input guide to enter the same parameters as the sample calculation.
resultsComparison.testStep2: Click the "Calculate" button to execute the calculation.
resultsComparison.testStep3: Compare the displayed results with the sample calculation results.
resultsComparison.testStep4: Perform similar tests with multiple sample calculations to verify the reliability of the system.

overview.title: System Overview
overview.description: Overview of the Drywall Partition System Structural Calculation System
overview.purposeText: This system is a web-based tool for accurately verifying the structural suitability of KIRII dry wall steel C-type studs and ceiling suspension systems. It aims to streamline the design process and ensure design safety and regulatory compliance.
mainFeaturesList: Wall Stud Calculation Module: Structural calculation of C-type and CT-type steel studs
Ceiling Suspension System Calculation Module: Structural calculation of runners and hanging hangers
calculationTargetsList: Wall Studs: KIRII C-type and CT-type steel studs
Ceiling Suspension System: KIRII runners (FRC main runners, RRC runners) and M12 threaded rods (hanging hangers), Hilti HST3 wedge anchors
structuralCheckItemsList: Common: Bending strength, shear strength, web buckling, deflection limit
Wall Studs: Combined bending and compression action
Ceiling Suspension System: Hanger tensile force, anchor tensile resistance

wallStud.title: Wall Stud Calculation Module
wallStud.description: How to use the Wall Stud Calculation Module and calculation contents
inputItemsList: Project Basic Information: Project name, calculation target detail, calculation date, author
Material Properties: Yield strength, elastic modulus, material factor
Component Section Properties: Stud type, bearing length
Geometric Configuration: Span between supports, tributary width/stud spacing
Load Conditions: Wind load, imposed load, dead load, load from wall fixtures
Deflection Criteria: L/240, L/360, or custom value
calculationContentsList: Bending Moment: Comparison of total bending moment from wind load, imposed load, and wall fixtures with bending capacity
Shear Force: Comparison of shear force from wind load with shear capacity
Web Buckling: Comparison of shear force with web buckling capacity
Deflection: Comparison of deflection from wind load with allowable deflection
Combined Action: Comparison of combined bending and compression action ratio with limit value
wallStud.calculationFormulaSummaryText: This system uses calculation formulas based on design codes such as "2007 North American Specification LRFD". Detailed calculation formulas are included in the PDF report.

ceiling.title: Ceiling Suspension System Calculation Module
ceiling.description: How to use the Ceiling Suspension System Calculation Module and calculation contents
inputItemsList: Project Basic Information: Project name, calculation target detail, calculation date, author
Material Properties: Yield strength, elastic modulus, material factor
Component Section Properties: Runner type, hanger type, anchor type
Geometric Configuration: Runner support span, hanger spacing, runner spacing
Load Conditions: Wind load, dead load
Deflection Criteria: L/240, L/360, or custom value
calculationContentsList: Runner Bending: Comparison of bending moment from wind load and dead load with runner's bending capacity
Runner Shear: Comparison of shear force from wind load and dead load with runner's shear capacity
Runner Deflection: Comparison of deflection from wind load and dead load with allowable deflection
Hanger Tension: Comparison of tensile force acting on the hanger with hanger's tensile capacity
Anchor Tension: Comparison of tensile force acting on the anchor with anchor's tensile capacity
ceiling.calculationFormulaSummaryText: This system uses calculation formulas based on design codes such as "2007 North American Specification LRFD". Detailed calculation formulas are included in the PDF report.

reference.title: Reference Materials
reference.description: Reference materials and design codes used for calculations
designCodesList: 2007 North American Specification LRFD (Load and Resistance Factor Design)
Architectural Institute of Japan "Steel Structure Design Standard"
Building Standard Law of Japan and its Enforcement Order
productDataList: KIRII Product Catalog: Section properties of C-type studs, CT-type studs, FRC main runners, RRC runners
Hilti Product Data Sheet: Performance values of HST3 wedge anchors
technicalDocumentsList: Technical Guidelines for Light Gauge Steel Framing Work and Commentary (Architectural Institute of Japan)
Standard Specifications for Building Construction Works and Commentary JASS 26 Interior Work (Architectural Institute of Japan)
